11. You are my wife. For that reason, and in view of the natural affection I have for you, and in order to provide you with some homestead property, I have entered into the Schedule as set out in paragraph 111 below, and I have not previously made any mortgages, charges, guarantees, seizures, etc., or any other encumbrances, and I have inherited the property through my father's will, and my name is registered in the Revenue's accounts as a beneficiary and I am paying house taxes, electricity bills, etc., and since the date of the property, I have been in full possession of the property, and no one else has any right to it, and this Schedule is undisputed. The property of R.C.C. Dabail is hereby transferred to you free of charge for the above reasons and the property as per the schedule is hereby transferred to you immediately. Therefore, from now on, the said property as per the schedule shall be registered in your name in all revenue accounts of the Government/Panchayat etc. and you shall pay the taxes etc. payable thereon and enjoy it freely and happily as you wish, with full rights of loan, sale and all other rights of your son, grandson and heirs. Neither I nor my heirs, nor you nor your heirs, shall ever be able to make any dispute regarding this settlement document. Whatever disputes, disagreements or disagreements may arise from anyone regarding this matter, I will settle them all at my own expense and responsibility and execute this settlement document for you without any delay. New I hereby certify that the property transferred by this deed under Section 22-B (Central Act 16 of 1908) is the property acquired by me/us by inheritance/self-acquired and that no one else has any right over it except me/us, that no sale or transaction has been made by me/us to anyone else and that no alienation has been made by me/us. At the time of making this deed, we have attached all the necessary documents like attachment/encumbrance certificate, details of the parties, addresses of the parties, photographs of the parties, details of the property etc. The Scheduled Property has been physically inspected and measured and the deed has been signed. I/We shall be fully responsible for any discrepancies in the above matters in the future.
The Deficit Stamp Duty, Registration Fees,
User Charges payable on this deed are Rs. 45, 500/- on 01-12-2025 through its CFMS Challan and a copy of the said Challan is filed herewith.

sections.content: The property covered under Gift Settlement Deed No. 7699 of 2025, dated 02/Dec/2025, executed by Badireddi Krishna, in favour of his Wife, Badireddi Krishna [R] Badireddi Sunitha, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 97.77 Sq. Yds., bearing house number 6-1002 (old) & 4-182 (New), Assessment number 1002, comprised in survey number 66, situated in Rampuram Village and Grama Panchayath, Pendurthi Mandal, within the District of Visakhapatnam, registered at sub-registrar office Pendurthi (318) is bounded as follows: North by: C.C. Road South by: Slab House Of Gandi Varaha Ramachandra Rao East by: Site Of Gandi Varaha Ramachandra Rao West by: Slab House Of Gandi Parvathi. Note: Schedule property is part of Gramakantam as per recitals of the deed.
It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or Lease Deed.

Note: It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number, and Split Survey/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
